education_text.0: Sheila Adele Greibach (born 6 October 1939 in New York City) is an American researcher in      Formal language formal languages in computing,      redirect    automata,      compiler theory and      Computer science computer scienceShe continued to work at Harvard at the Division of Engineering and Applied Physics until 1969 when she moved to      redirect    University of California in Los Angeles UCLA, where she has been a professor until present (as of March 2014)She continued to work at Harvard at the Division of Engineering and Applied Physics until 1969 when she moved to      redirect    University of California in Los Angeles UCLA, where she has been a professor until present (as of March 2014)Among her students were
